title: Kiwi, apple and mint juice
description: This is a quick and tangy juice, packed with plenty of vitamin C. The fresh mint here makes for a really refreshing drink.

method.Step 1: Peel the kiwis, quarter and juice. Quarter the apple and juice, then juice the whole sprigs of mint. Mix the juices together. Chill. Serve in short glasses, and pop in an ice cube, if you like.
